attributes.action: implement the additional protocol signed by Turkey and the European Economic Community on 23 November 1970 and honour the rule of ECJ about Turkish nationals who were planning to enter EU states to provide service..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On February 19, 2009, European Court of Justice ruled that visas should not be required from Turkish nationals who were planning to enter EU-member states to provide service.
Article 41 of this Additional Protocol prohibits the
introduction of new national restrictions on the freedom of establishment and right of residence of Turkish nationals as from the date on which that protocol entered into force in the host Member State.
